content.question: The mass of a proton is 1.673×10-27 kg, and the mass of a neutron is 1.675×10-27 kg. A proton and neutron combine to form a deuteron, releasing 3.520×10-13 J. What is the mass of the deuteron?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
